Title: The Dirt
Writer: Amanda Adelson (screenplay), Tommy Lee (book), Mick Mars (book), Vince Neil (book), Nikki Sixx (book), Neil Strauss (book), Rich Wilkes (screenplay)
Actors: Machine Gun Kelly, Erin Ownbey, Douglas Booth, Aaron Jay Rome
Plot: Based on the bestselling autobiography from Mötley Crüe, the film is an unflinching tale of success and excess as four misfits rise from the streets of Hollywood to the heights of international fame.
